name: Vector IM Crunch UserStyle by sbts
description:
This userstyle (theme) reduces the wasted screen realestate by reducing roomlist font and avatar size and other changes to reduce the amount of whitespace present on the screen.

Please Install font "InconsolataGo" as instructed in the Notes below

Contact the Author (dcg_mx) at
https://vector.im/#/room/#sbts:matrix.org
additional_info:
To get the best out of this userstyle you will probably want to zoom out by 1 step
and install one of the following fonts.
They are listed in order of preference
  * InconsolataGo
  * Inconsolata
  * Consolas
  * monospace

InconsolataGo and Inconsolata can be obtained from
http://levien.com/type/myfonts/inconsolata.html

The direct link for InconsolataGo is
http://levien.com/type/myfonts/inconsolata


This style works well with
Vector IM Slate UserStyle by sbts
https://userstyles.org/styles/126879/vector-im-slate-userstyle-by-sbts


Contact the Author (dcg_mx) at
https://vector.im/#/room/#sbts:matrix.org

This theme is also available in a github repository [here](https://github.com/sbts/UserStyles-vector-im)
